extendedInfo.description: CAUTION! The Mayan gods have noticed that mankind did not take seriously the end of the world predictions... They are very angry and want to destroy Earth at all costs! It won't be long before a meteor shower hits our planet...Fortunately, mankind has discovered the true purpose of the pyramids of Egypt: they can draw and condense the telluric energy of the Earth and turn it into a powerful beam of cosmic energy! Is there anything better to fight against evil meteors?FEATURESâ¢ Defend the Earth against hordes of Mayan meteorsâ¢ Improve your defense abilities by choosing among 21 skillsâ¢ Use and exploit your 6 powerful ritualsâ¢ Be the bravest by trying out the Hardcore Mode!â¢ 48 medals to collect for hours of funâ¢ Immerse yourself in an original universe halfway between Mayan and Egyptian culturesâ¢ Compare your scores with your friends and the whole world via ScoreloopIf you manage to protect us all against these meteors, humanity may escape its tragic end and we will have time to add the following features:â¢ Bosses!So don't wait anymore and save our planet!SUPPORT & FEEDBACKPlease contact help@sofreshgames.com for any issue or feedback, we'd love to hear from you!Follow @SoFreshGames on Twitter for the latest development updates, news & tips: http://twitter.com/SoFreshGamesYou can also reach us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/sofreshgamesMORE SOFRESH GAMESRuniK http://market.android.com/details?id=org.stonar.games.runikRuniK is a highly acclaimed refreshing twist to the matching and bubble popping games. Easy to play yet challenging to master, RuniK is a relaxing casual game with plenty of strategic depth.MegaFlux http://market.android.com/details?id=com.sofresh.games.megafluxMegaFlux is a challenging and rewarding puzzle game which revisits the plumber classic with new rules and a colorful tech setting!SEARCH KEYWORDSfree game, casual game, arcade game, action game, addictive, defense, maya, pyramid, shoot, meteor

reviews.title: This game is awesome!!
reviews.comment: Do you need to say anything else? This is one super fun game!!
reviews.author: Jason Steven

reviews.title: Amazing game.
reviews.comment: Great game, very addictive, keep the gd work, yet the ads are a bit annoying
reviews.author: Ralph Matni

reviews.title: Really fun! !
reviews.comment: I just started and it\'s already super fun.
reviews.author: Aaron Rodriguez

reviews.title: Fun and addictive f*** game :)
reviews.comment: Very friendly user and funny game !
reviews.author: Jonathan Richer

reviews.title: Great but lacking end game
reviews.comment: 4 stars because of the lack of endgame motivation. Great game to start with, and very addicting ... just gets way too repetitive after a while. Throw in some more unique npc movements and types with some variation of spawn order to change it up and I\'ll gladly give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Colby Meier

reviews.title: Nice one
reviews.comment: Great entertaining game: quite challenging, and easy to spend hours on this. Thumbs up!
reviews.author: Romuald Krasensky

reviews.title: Great game! Beware, it is addictive!
reviews.author: Pierre Mage

reviews.title: Finally !
reviews.comment: I was waiting for a way to fight against the mayan threat ! Thanks for this !
reviews.author: Florian Minjat
